item.title: Genetic engineering -- benefits over ethics?
item.description: This artwork complements an article from ISSIA called “Genetic engineering – benefits over ethics?

item.title: Social Media: Why Are Some Apps More Successful Than Others?
item.description: This artwork complements an article from ISSIA called “Social Media: Why Are Some Apps More Successful Than Others?

item.title: COVID19
item.description: This artwork complements the many COVID-19 related article from ISSIA.

item.title: Social Credit System
item.description: This artwork complements an international article submission from ISSIA called ‘Human rights activists alert: “Social Credit System” of China is the next massive surveillance act of digital slavery.

item.title: Nihilism within our modern 'work culture'
item.description: This artwork complements an international article submission from ISSIA called ‘Human rights activists alert: “Social Credit System” of China is the next massive surveillance act of digital slavery.

item.title: Podcast Cover
item.description: This artwork is the Official ISSIA Podcast Cover. It depicts two people debating through the speech bubbles in the background.

item.title: Commission for ratscene
item.description: This artwork is a commissioned piece for ratscene through Instagram. It depicts a couple (Kokichi Ouma from DanganronpaV3) (Miu Iruma from DanganronpaV3) falling and reaching out for each other.

item.title: A Life I’ve Come to Miss
item.description: This artwork complements a poem from ISSIA called “A Life I’ve Come to Miss” by Katie Warren

item.title: Doomsday Clock
item.description: This artwork complements an article from ISSIA called “Why You Should Care about Politics” by Daniel Chung

item.title: Why You Should Care about Politics
item.description: This artwork complements an article from ISSIA called “Why You Should Care about Politics” by Daniel Chung

item.title: Commissioned 'Miya Twins'
item.description: This artwork is a commissioned piece which is an extension from the commission “Sakuatsu”.

item.title: Commission for mx.mota
item.description: This artwork is a commissioned piece for mx.mota through Instagram. It depicts a boy called Kaito Momota from “DanganronpaV3”

item.title: Conflicting Worlds
item.description: Conflicting Worlds highlights the lost emotion in the detachment of reality.

item.title: The Year 3000
item.description: The final digital work depicts escapism’s role in the future, where the VR Headset streams a nature scene, with clouds creating my own “headspace”.

item.title: Struggle
item.description: Struggle is an abstract piece that represents the struggle of controlling my responsibilities in real life.

item.title: 2019 50th Edition Back Page
item.description: This is the Victorian’s 2019 50th Edition Back Page. It reveals the newspaper mascot as a god-like being.

item.title: 2019 Nov Edition Front Page
item.description: Related to one of the articles in the Newspaper, This cover represents an iPhone lock screen.

item.title: Freedom
item.description: Inspired by visual qualities of the Clock Tower in Time Square and Dali’s The Persistence of Memory, Freedom depicts how escapism steals one’s future.

item.title: Slaughterhouse-5 inspired prototype
item.description: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UdOpDqwspZ90ABIK6HQ4zjnAXfo3afTO/view https://github.com/crushedsummers/Weary I was inspired by a character from Slaughterhouse-5 to create a first person perspective shooter game,

item.title: Rabbit Hole
item.description: Rabbit Hole depicts escapism as falling into an inescapable hole. This can be seen as various poses, expressing pleasure, are layered further and further away from the audience, creating depth.

item.title: The Stigma Around Breastfeeding
item.description: This video was submitted to the “Supporting Mothers’ Breastfeeding Journey” Secondary School Short Video Competition and was merit awarded.

item.title: Chrome Extension
item.description: https://github.com/crushedsummers/AC303/tree/master/project4 https://github.com/crushedsummers/AC303/tree/master/project4.1 I created some chrome extensions as I felt that chrome’s bookmark features were lacking.

item.title: Pong
item.description: https://crushedsummers.github.io/AC303/project3/ I replicated Pong and made it challenging, the highest score is 18

item.title: Creative Edit
item.description: This is one of the many video edits I created, where I use Adobe After Effects to express my creativity

item.title: Corruption of Desire
item.description: This work is inspired by Philip Larkin’s concept in Essential Beauty, where advertisements produce a perfect world based on the products, they encourage escapism.

item.title: Phaser experiment
item.description: https://crushedsummers.github.io/AC302/lesson9/ I experimented with Phaser, which is a software that easily make games using HTML Canvas.

item.title: PACMAN prototype
item.description: https://crushedsummers.github.io/AC302/lesson6/ I experimented by making a pacmac prototype with HTML Canvases

item.title: Donate to Extend A Life Poster
item.description: This is one of the two advertisement posters I created to promote the 2019 Blood Donation school event.

item.title: Chess
item.description: https://crushedsummers.github.io/IChess/ I created (an incomplete) Chess through JQuery and presented it to a group of parents and students.

item.title: Underneath the Shadows series
item.description: The series is inspired by Shirin Neshat’s cultural inspiration application, where I look particularly into my culture and struggles with society: language barrier.

item.title: Iron Month Poster
item.description: This is one of the two advertisement posters I created to promote the 2019 Blood Donation school event.

item.title: A Geranium's Journey
item.description: This animation was submitted to the 2018「Movie Character Created By Me」- Video Competition hosted by the Hong Kong Playground Association and received Semi-Finalist (out of 1500 videos).

item.title: School Production: Decade
item.description: Decade is a school production about the 9/11 incident.

item.title: 2018 CAS Edition Front Page
item.description: This is the Victorian’s 2018 CAS Edition Front Page. It also reveals the winning student council of the year.

item.title: Text Adventure Games
item.description: https://codepen.io/Qu4rtz/full/KQYmVm I was always inspired to make my own games. With my limited programming knowledge, I decided to start with text adventure games.

item.title: Green Forest
item.description: Green Forest is inspired by Mucha’s art nouveau nature motif. It depicts how I feel isolated from society, which became a trigger to escape.

item.title: First Website
item.description: https://codepen.io/Qu4rtz/full/goapzK I wanted to showcase my progress and projects I created.

item.title: The Origins of WWII
item.description: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1_ykn3iHat7GVBQ_83l3FjffRboOewGPl?usp=sharing I decided to use Ren.py python to create a visual novel game.
